name: Pride Of The Empire
Lore: 'Imperial starships that perform with distinction are highly publicized in an attempt to make the pilots look like heroes to the citizens of the Empire.',
Text: 'If opponent just lost a starship in a battle you won, deploy on your participating starfighter. Once during each of opponent''s move phases, opponent loses 1 Force (2 if starfighter is a TIE/ln). Also, that starfighter is power +2. (Immune to Control.)',
